This isn't really a bug.. 
Say I write an intro to an email and copy and paste something from a website which has different font size then the body of the email. I want to keep the everything about the font the same from the website (color, text decor, etc) except the  size.. I want the font size to match the the body of the email. So I highlight the body of the email goto Format->Size and choose small. The style of the text I typed changed but the copy and pasted stuff remains the same....

I could goto Format->Remove all text styles and resize, but that removes all the other style I wanted to keep...



Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Start typing an email 
2.copy and paste somethign with different style
3.try to change the style of everything to make it all match. 
4.only the stuff you type will change.
